Curia balliuorum de Aberdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem decimoquarto die
mensis Aprilis Anno Dominj et cetera quingentesimo octauo

The said day Elizibetht scherar' forspekar for the douchtir of Duncan smytht allegeit
that cristian tailyeour douchtir to Duncan tailyour aucht to the douchteris of the
said Duncan smytht xxviij s' apone certane charteris the quhilkis the said cristian'
denyit And the said Elizibetht tuk to preif that scho aucht the said Sowme
to the said Elizibetht to preive the said cristian awand' the said xxviij s' to the
said domicellis And' quhat that the said Elizibetht previs that the said cristian aw
on' the said euidentis to mak pament to the said damicellis

The said day Androw michelsone protestit that the continuacioun' of the breif of
lynyng to the law day turne him to na preiudice

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xv die aprilis
anno quo supra

Eodem die Willelmus Skynner conuictus fuit per assisam Juratam ex ore thome leslie
prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio Jacobi smitht Cuj emendabit ut Jura volunt et Idem
Jacobus conuictus de perturbio prefati Willelmum Et dictus Willelmus exonerauit prefatum
Jacobum de suo seruicio et omni quietclameo suj seruicij

Eodem die Andreas Skynner deuenit plegius legalis quod Jacobus smitht erit Indemp
nis pro Willelmo skynner aliter quam per viam Juris Et Robertus Waus deuenit
plegius legalis quod dictus Willelmus erit Indempnes pro prefato Jacobo aliter quam per
viam Juris et vtraque pars alligauit ad conseruandum suos plegios Indempnes de
huiusmodi fideiussione et cetera
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem quarto die mensis anno quo supra

The said' day thomas leslie and William rolland procuratoris for my lord of arbrothoc one that ane part Ande chesit
Dauid menyeis and Johne mar' William Dalgarnow chesit the larde of phillortht and Johne fraser in ardglasse
and gilbert menyeis prouest of Abirdene ourman to conuen' within the tolbutht of the burghe of Abirdene one the trinite evin next
to cum tile and' and deliuer thar finale decret anent the clame of the ferybait of Dee destroit be the said William
Dalgarnow as Is allegit and to bring thar witnes and preuis to the said' day Ande oblist thame be the fathtis
of thar bodiis to stand' and abid' at thar deliuerance in the premiss' but fraude or gile

The said day the Prouost Bailyes and counsale grantit and Consentit
thar commone' Seill to be appensit

Eodem die accedens ad barram Religiosus vir frater Johannes Spens procurator
prioris et conuentus domus fratrum predicatorum dicti burgi et protestatus fuit in forma
Juris pro vno annuo redditu sex solidorum et octo denariorum monete scocie dicto loco a longo
tempore debito et non soluto de quadam terra vasta quondam Robertj club Jacente in vico
superiore ecclesie dictj burgj inter terram Roberti Waus ex orientali ex vna et terram olim
henricj tulidef ex occidentali partibus ab altera terram interiorem dominj Johannis ruthirfurd'
versus austrum et communionem viam regiam versus boream Ad quam terram accedens in de
fectu solucionis dictj annuj redditus nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides
quos balliuos in sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam tercio die huius processus Testibus
Andrea smytht Willelmo smtht et Andrea nachtie sergeando

Eodem die accedens ad barram Religiosus vir frater Johannes spens procurator
priorum et conuentus domus fratrum predicatorum dictj burgi et protestabatur in forma
Juris pro vno annuo redditu xiij s' et iiij d' vsualis monete scocie dicto loco
annuatim debito et a longo tempore non soluto de quadam terra vasta quondam Johannis
gillespy Jacente in vico castri dicti burgi ex australi parte eiusdem inter terram
Johannis malisone ex occidentali ex vna et communionem viam regiam ex orientali
partibus ab altera terram quondam Dauid matheus versus austrum et communionem viam
regiam versus boream Ad quam terram accedens in defectu solucionis dicti
annuj redditus nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos balliuis
in sacculo presentauit curia tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus Andrea smytht
Willelmo smytht et Andrea nauchtie sergeando

Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir dominus thomas Bynne capellanus
perpetuus altaris sancti michaelis archangeli situati infra ecclesiam sancti nicholaij
dicti burgi et protestabatur in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu quatuor solidorum
monete scocie sibi et dicto altari annuatim debito de quadam terra vasta alexander
crag Jacente infra dictum bugum in le skulhill inter terram Willelmi belty
ex orientali ex vna et terram Willelmi moir ex occidentali partibus ab altera communionem
viam regiam versus austrum et latum dicti burgj versus boream Ad quam terram
accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos balliuis in
sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus Andrea smytht
Willelmo smytht et Andrea nauchtie sergeando

Eodem die accedens ad barram famosus vir Willelmus rolland burgensis
dictj burgj et protestabatur in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu decim
solidorum vsualis monete scocie sibi annuatim debito et a longo tempore non soluto
de quadam terra vasta
Ad quam terram accedens in defectu solucionis huismodi annuj Redditus nichil
reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos balliuis in Sacculo presentauit
in curia tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus gilberto prestone Andrea
low et Normanno leslie sergeando

Eodem die Compertum fuit per legittimam Inquisicionem curie
quod georgeus Watsone alias beltar est legittimus et propinquior heres
quondam Andree Watsone alias beltar patris suj Quj obijt ad pacem et
fidem dominj nostri Regis

The said day the baillies continewit the Actioun' of strublace betuix
Androu gordone and gilbert tulideff baxtaris to friday that nixt cummys
vnder hoip of concord And chargit baitht the said partijs to comper the said
day for ministracioun' of Justice

Eodem die thomas Waus deuenit plegius legalis Andreas gordoun'
erit Indempnes pro gilberto tulideff aliter quam per viam Juris Et
patricius chernsid' deuenit plegius legalis quod dictus gilbertus erit In
dempnes pro dicto Andrea aliter quam per viam Juris Et vtraque pars
obligauit se ad conseruandum suos plegios Indempnes de huiusmodi
fideiussione

The said' day the prouest and balyeis at commavnde of our' Souerane lordis lettres lousit the
arrest and fens' maide of the anniellis and malis pertening tile Isabele buchane
douchtir and ayr' to vmquhile Williame buchane burges of the said' burghe
to Robert guthtrie factour to the said' Isabele et cetera nochtwithstanding thai exponit
and declarit thai maid' neuir arrest vpon' the said' annuellis and malis And'
the saide Robert producit and schew the lawe that thaie said' Isabell is vteuthe
tutorie et cetera

The said day It was statut' and ordanit be the Alderman baillies and counsale
that ale personis that ar abill within this burgh' salbe reddy with thar arrayment maid'
in grene and yalow bowis Arrowis brass' And all vthir conuenient thingis ac
cording tharto to pas' with Robyne Hvyd and litileJohnne' all tymes convenient
tharto quhen thai be Requirit be the saidez Robyne and litileJohne' eftir the tenor
of the statutis and proclamacioun maide be the Prouoistis baillies and counsaill obefor
And gif ony of the said personis happinis to failye in ony poynt befor writyne sal pay
fourty schillingis vnforgevin And sall nocht breuk
nor Jois' tak fischeing nor' land' of the said burgh'

Inquisicio facta apud burgum de Aberdene octauo die mensis Maij Anno dominj millesimo
quingentesimo octauo Coram honorabilibus viris gilberto menyeis preopsito Johanne
mar Dauid mar et Willelmo portar tribus balliuorum dicti burgi in pretorio eiusdem
in curia capitali balliuorum protribunali sedentibus per subsctiptum videlicet Dauid menyeis de
petfodellis Johannem ruthirfurd militem Johanne collisone thomam chamer alexandrum Mar
thomam leslie Alexandrum gray malcomum crag Willelmum murray patricium chernsid'
thomam Watsone Richardum hill Richardum Waus et Johannem Kintor burgenses
dicti burgi Quj Jurati dicunt quod quondam thomas prat pater Elizibetht prat latricis presencium
obiit vltimo vestitus et sasitus ut defeodo ad pacem et fidem dominj nostri regis de terris et annuis redditibus
subscriptis Jacente infra dictum burgum videlicet de vna terra sine tenemento anteriore et interiore Jacente in
vico castri et boreali parte eiusdm vicj inter terram quondam thome fif ex orientali ex vna et terram
Johannis murray ex occidentali partibus ab altera et communionem viam regiam vsque austram et terram dicti quondam thome
fif vsque boream de duabis terris collateraliter Jacente in eodem vico ex boreali parte eiusdem vicj
inter terram quondam alexandri houysone ex orientali ex vna et terram Johannis cullan ex occidentali
partibus ab altera terram Isabelle buchan versus boream et communionem viam regiam vsque austrum de
alia terra Jacente sub pede montis casti inter communiones vias regias versus oriens et boream terram
quondam Dauid mathousone et torrentem sancte trinitatis vsque occidens et austrum de vno tofto et
crofto Jacente in futy inter terram Johannis maitland' ex australi ex vna et terram fratrum presdicatorum
ex boreali partibus ab altera communionem viam regiam versus occidens extendens in longitudine ad le linkis
versus oriens de vna terra Jacente in vico superiore ecclesie ex australi parte eiusdem vicj inter terram
thome buchan ex orientali ex vna et terram quondam Ebote traill ex occidentali partibus ab altera
terram quondam thome mar versus austrum et communionem viam regiam versus boream de vno crofto
Jacente in territorio croftorum de Rubislaw inter croftum fratrum carmelitarum ex orientali ex vna
et croftum dicti gilberti menyes prepositi ex occidentali partibus ab altera de vna crofto le Ward'
vocato Jacente inter communionem viam regiam qua Itur ad terris de rubisalw ex australi ex vna
et torrentem inter le gilchamstone et terras de rubislaw ex boreali partibus ab altera de vno
annuo redditu decim solidorum de terra Johannis grig Jacente in vico furcarum ex orientali parte eiusdem vicj
inter terram quondam richardi cullan ex australi ex vna et terram quondam gilbertj leitht ex boreali partibus
ab altera Et de vno annuo redditu sex solidorum et octo denariorum de terra quondam patricij coupar'
Jacente in vico viridj qua itur a cimiterio ecclesie sancte nicholaij ad ecclesiam fratrum carmelitarum ex ori
entali parte eiusdem vicj inter terram quondam Dauid patersone ex australi ex vna et terram altarum
beate marie magdalene ex boreali partibus ab altera terram quondam Johannis mathousone versus
oriens et communionem viam regiam versus occidens Et quod dicta Elisibetht est vna de legittimis et propinquio
ribus heredibus dicti quondam thome patris suj de dictis terris croftis et annuis redditibus cum pertinencijs
Et quod est legittime Etatis Et quod dicti terre et crofte valent nunc per annuum vigintj libros et
valuerunt vigintj marcas tempore pacis Et valor dictorum annuorum d reddituum patet
in se Et quod dicte terre crofte et annuj redditus cum pertinenciis tenentur in capite de suppremo domino nostro
rege per seruicium burgagium Et quod dicte terre crofte et annuj redditus nunc existunt in manibus An
nabelle gordone relicta dicte quondam thome prat racione coniuncte infeodacionis pro toto tempore
vite sue datum et clausum sub sigillo dictj Willelmum portar balliuj et sigillis quondam eorum
quj huic Inquisicionj intererant faciendum anno die mense et loco prenotatis

Curia Balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem decimo die mensis
Maij Anno dominj et cetera quingentesimo octauo

The said day Williame boll skipper of the barg of the said burgh' Willeame abirdour
his clerk Johnne fechat and Johnne reid' was quyt be ane suorn' assis' ser Johnn'
forspekar of the wranguis' Intrometting of Richerd Wauss' keling fische being in
the said schip And ser Johnne come law borgh' that Willeame boll salbe skathles of
Richerd Waus all wais bot as the course of common' law And alexander gray come souerte
plegius legalis and law borgh' that the said Richerd salbe skaithles of the said Willeame all wais bot as
the course of common' law will

Curia balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem vndecimo die mensis maij
Anno quosupra

The said day Androu Mortimer was conuikit be ane suorne assis' ser Johnne ruthirfurd'
forspekar for the strublance of Elizibetht blinseill for the quhilkis he was in amerciament
of the court sic as he aucht to tyne of law And that was gevin for dome And the said Elizibetht
quyt of all strublance of hte saide Androue And the sall Androu obilst hyme be the faitht
of his bodie' to stand and abid at the deliuerance and ordinance of the said assis' for the amendis
to be maid to the said Elizibetht be his hand vphaldin And thareftir the said assis' riplie auisit
ordanit the said Androue to cum one sonday that nixt cummys in tyme of the hiemes in
his lynning clais' with ane lous' gowne barhed and bairfut with ane candill in his
hand contening ane pund' of wax and ask the said Elizibetht and failyeing scho be
nocht present thomas lesly hir spous forgevnes for the said offence done to hir and offer'
the said candill to the haly blud' licht And gif euire the said Androw happinis to tribull the
said Elizibetht thomas hir spous or ony vthir honorable persone And specialie thame that has
borne office of the tovne and beis couikit tharof sal pay v merkis to Sanct nicholes werk
vnforgevin Alsua the said thomas fand' thomas chamer of quyltis law borrowe
plegius legalis that the said Androu mortymer salbe skathles of the said thomas all wais bot as the
course of common' law will And the said Androw fand' thomas Wod law borgh' for
him that the said thomas and Elizibetht salbe skathles of him all wais bot as the
course of common' law And Ilkane of the said partijs ablist thame to keip thar said'
borrowis skaithles of the said Souerteis

Curia Balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem duodecimo die mensis
Maij Anno quosupra

The said day gilbert tulideff lauchfully warnit callit and nocht comperit till
haue ansuerit at the Instance of Androw gordone and for strublance of him was
in amerciament of the court

The said day It was statut and ordanit be the Prouoist baillies and diuers'
of the counsaill present for the tyme and' communite that the millaris and takismen
of thame sale obserue and keipe the alde Statustis and actis maid obefor that
is to say ale the outsukin of the lande takis pertening to the burghe sale cum
and gryne thar cornis at the Justice myllis Ande ale the Inhabitantis of this
burghe sale grinde ale thar' cornis at the nethir mylle and vuere myllis bat of properte
ande accident except' Except' the Induellaris one the west half one the burne
discending fra the vuer' myle to the nethir mull quhilkis is annexit to the Justice
myllis thar' to grind' thar' cornis and pay thar' multar Ande that the
tennentis of the lande takis and the baxtaris ande vthiris Induellaris of the toune
sale ger' bring thar cornis to the saide myllis as saide Is and to nayne
outmyllis vndir the pane of xl s' of Ilkane persone that brekis this statut'
to be appliit to the commone werk of the toune and to pay doubile multar
to thar avne myllis quhome to thai ar' assignit Ande that nay baxtar
nor vthir persone haue thar' cornez fra the myle quhar thai ar' assignit
vndir the pane of xl s' vnforgevin to be pait to the denis of gild'
for Reformacion of the key and vthir commone werk of the toune Ande that
nay millar' resaue vthiris cornis thane it that is assignit to thame
as said' Is vndir the saide pane of xl s' lesuis' thane thai cane
nocht be seruit and stede at thar avne myllis assignit to thame Ande or
thai pas' with thar corne tile ony myle fra thar avne thai sale
Cum to the aldirman or tile ane balye and preiwe Sufficientlie befor
thame that thai may nocht be seruit at thar avne myle and ask leif
to haue thar cornis to ane vthir myle of the tone for that tyme

The saide day gilbert tulidef lauchfullie warnit and nocht comperit tile ansuer'
for trubulance of Androw gordone and having of his corne fra his myllis was in
amerciament of the court et cetera

The said' day It was Statut and ordanit be the aldirman and counsale for the common
weile of the tone that the wif of Alexander horne the wif James Strathachin the
wif of cristy prat the wif Androw bavne the wif Johne flessour the wif of gilbert
paule the wif of philp of Kelty margaret litstar Katherine vrchald' the wif of
Androw stevart the wif Johne Ra and ale vthiris broustaris and mercat Spillaris
sale pay Ilkane of thame tua punde of wax to the haly blud' licht in continent and
viij s' for thar vnlawe to the balyeis in continent Ande gif ony of thame commit
sic falt In tyme to cum salbe secludit fra brevin and the mercat for ane yer but
ony remissioun' quhilkis personis was conuict be ane Suorne assis' for brekin of
commone ordinance in the Spilling of the mercat and Selling of aile derrar than the sta
tutis of the tone

head.add: the personis takatis of the ber' at thar avne handis

div.p:
The said' day cristy prat mathou branche thome Ridale alexander horne William blinsele
coupar and A Robert scrogis was conuict' be ane Suorne assis' ser Johne ruthirfurd' for
spekar for the avay takin of sex li' of ber' vndeliuerit to tham and aw to restoir'
the samyn agane to the key / Scottis Duncan Robene hud' Canny goue Effy Douge
kilis and Johne scot his marrow was conuict for the careing of the said beir' et cetera thar'
cragis salbe put in the goif and stand thar at the aldirmannis wile

head.add: Statut' anent the resat of beir' and meile et cetera

div.p:
The said' day it was statut and ordanit be the prouest and Counsale that nay
persone sale Intromett with beir' meile nor quhet quhile It be deliuerit be the
prouest vndir the pand of eschaet of the g' samyn and paing of fiwe merkis vn
forgevin

The said' day the balyeis counsale and communite present for the tyme consentit and
ordanit the prouest to by the iij schippis with ber' and meile and wittale
befor the havin one the samyn price he bocht this schip and thai suld' freithe
him tharof and resaue It and pay for the samyn
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xiij die mensis maij anno quo supra

Curia balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem decimoquinto die Maij Anno
quo supra

The said day Maroun' stokar the wif of Richerd barnis grantit that scho had sauld
ane stik of quhit clatht to Robert scrogis for xxij s' the dusane and had ressauit in Arlis
of It ane lew of gold And thareftir the baillies chargit Normond of lesly officiar to lay
wand' on' the said marioun' and caus hir to deliuer the said clatht to the said robert in continent
becaus he is on' his wiag to saill and ressaue hir pament' tharof

Curia Balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem decimonono
die mensis Maij Anno et cetera quingentesimo octauo

The said day Alexander hay was in amerciament of the court be his avin
tong grant for the strublance of Emy the wif of robert thamdaill in the
casting out of hir geir out of ane hous' quhilk scho had in tak quhill wit
sonday that nixt cummys becaus It was referrit to the said Emeis aitht that scho
gef nocht command to the said alexander to cast out hir said gudes

The saide day the borgh' fundin be thomas leslie forspekar for Elizibeth
blinseill his wif one Androue mortimer that he had wrangit in the one
fulfilling of the act and' deliuerance maid obefor be ane suorne assis'
that he suld' haue cumin one sonday bigane in tyme of the hie mes' within the
peris' kirk of the said burgh' in lynnyng clais with ane lous' govne ber
fute ande bair hed et cetera with ane candill in his hande contenyng ane pund
of vax et cetera And' ask the said Elizibeth or thomas for gevinnez in
hir absence for the offens' done to hir quharthroue in lichtleing of
the prouest and bailyeis And' in contempcioun' and dissobeying of thar ordinance
eftir the tenour of his oblissing be the faitht of his bodie was fundin
awaill be thir personis that is to say Dauid menyeis of petfodellis
ser Johnne ruthirfurde knicht Alexander gray mathour branche patry
rede Malcome crag William futhes William rolland' Dauid Adamson
Johnne Arthour Williame Kintor Johnne of Kintor Androw Stevinson
Dauid Straloch and Robert Kennerty burges of the said burgh'
and suorne in ane assis' with consent of the baitht the said partiis thar rychtis
resonis and allegacionis obefor hard' sene and vndirstandin for the quhilk
the said Androue was in ane amerciament of the court et cetera Ande aucht to
fulfill the said first deliuerance one sonday that nixt cumis and that
was gevin for dome

Eodem die compertums fuit per Inquisicionem curie quod Willelmus clerk
est legitimus et propinquior heres quondam patricij clerk patris suj

The said day Androue Johnesone was conuict' be ane suorne assis' James
colisone forspekar for the tribulance of mage broysour And' tile
amend as law will ande forber' in tyme to cum And atour it was
the said Mage was quyt of all tribulance of the said Androue
be the said assis' Ande for the mendis to be maid to the said mage
it was ordanit that the said Androue sale pay v s' to the leche And'
gif euer he committis ony talf in tyme to cum Ande' beis' conuict' tharof
he sale pay xl s' to Sanct Nicholace vark vnforgevin Alsua It
was ordanit and deliuerit be the saide assis' that the saide Androw sale pay v s'
to the saide mage for the trubulance done to hir'

The said day the Alderman and baillies assignit mononday that nixt
cummis to Robert murray pynour to preif that Andour Jhonsone' was avand'
him s' And ordanit the said Androw to compeir the said day to
heir the said preiffis takin

The the said day thir baxtaris eftir writin of thar avin fr motive and will
band' and oblist thame be the fathis of thar bodiis the greit bodely
aitht suorne to gilbert menyeis prouoist in the townis name that thai
sall bak tua d' breid of quheit weile bowtit clene gud and sufficient
stuff weil bakin contening xxij vncez to be disponit and distribuit
within the towne in the townis wse to the quantite and novmer of this
quheit vndir writin In the first Androw gordone iijxx bollis of quheit
thomas buchane xviij bollis Donald baxtar xxx bollis Johanne' baxtar
for him and his modir xxx bollis Richerd reidheid x bollis and demi And' to the
fulfilling and keping of this condicioun' thai war oblist and suorne as
said is but fraud or vndir the panis of mansuering Infamite and Inha
bilite for euire befor thir witnes Dauid menyeis ser Johnne ruthirfurd John
of cullane James colisone thomas leslie Dauid andirson' and mstir
Johnne baidienagh' with vdir diuers' vthir of the counsale

The said day the aldirman and bailyeis assignit mononday cum a xv
dais the fift day of Junij nixt tocum till Alexander hay till
